item.title: Image Manipulation with Python Pillow
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Joachim Weise)
item.description: Normally I use GIMP when I need to resize, crop or retouch images in various ways. However, for my last post on the Berlin Festival of Light I would have had to manually resize and crop a whole bunch of images at a time. That's why I took a look how Python could help with this task, and found PIL, the Python Imaging Library, in newer versions known as Pillow.
